JSONObject class

JSONObject class
This class holds the JSON Object implementation.

author : members@groupby.org

read

public JSONObject read(java.lang.String src,
                       int idx)
                throws JSONParsingException
Read a chunk of the input string, match JSON Object rules.

If the string is empty, the method returns null.

Specified by:
read in class JSON
Parameters:
src - the input string to parse
idx - the "cursor's" position, put 0 to begin a complete parsing
Returns:
a JSON Object representing a part of the input string.
Throws:
JSONParsingException - if the string is not correctly wrote.
See Also:
JSON.parse(java.lang.String src)
